author: ceki
msg: o.a.l.jdbc no longer included in log4j.jar

author: sdeboy
msg: - Created levelEqualsRule in order to bring performance of ExpressionFilter using equals rule (==) with the Level field in line with LevelMatchFilter (near-identical performance over 60 million events evaluated)
- Modified ExpressionRule and LevelInequalityRule in order to bring performance of ExpressionFilter using inequality rule with the Level field in line with LevelRangeFilter
For comparison sake, evaluating 60 million events with half of the events evaluating to a match:
- Added serialVersionUID fields to all rules

author: hoju
msg: Comment out System.out statement that was being printed every time getLoggerRepository() was called for a non-default repository.

author: hoju
msg: Set the guard in the case that the JVM was started with -Dlog4j.repositorySelectorClass=[JNDI | <fully qualified class name>] since this is an explicit action to set the repository selector and entirely equivalent to calling LogManger.setRepositorySelector().

author: hoju
msg: Fix compile errors even though the vfs package isn't currently used.  It makes it easier to deal with when working in an IDE like Eclipse which reports all compile errors constantly.
